name: Angry Birds Educational Game
description:
A very small part of AngryBirds educational game

Total new version is dedicated to Ramsis Private School of Alexandria

🎮The old version of this game was designed in 2019 for Ramsis Private School in Alexandria . which was established in 1976 by the honorable Mr. Ahmed Fattouh, may God have mercy on him 

🎮 We thanks Mr. Walid Ahmed Fattouh and Mr. Ibrahim El-Meligy for all the support and trust they have given us to reach what we are now ❤️

🤗You can contact Ramsis Private School via /

https://www.facebook.com/%D9%85%D8%AF%D8%A7%D8%B1%D8%B3-%D8%B1%D9%85%D8%B3%D9%8A...
